author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-JOST Werke FY Adj. EBIT Rises By 23% To EUR 76.4 Mln
text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - JOST Werke AG:
* ‍ADJUSTED EBIT ROSE SIGNIFICANTLY DURING REPORTING PERIOD BY 23% TO EUR 76.4 MILLION (2016: EUR 61.9 MILLION​
* FY ‍SALES UP 11% TO EUR 701.3 MILLION​ * FURTHER SALES AND EARNINGS GROWTH EXPECTED IN 2018 * ‍AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2017 nET DEBT MORE THAN HALVED TO EUR 113.3 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
